item.title: Visualizing resources managed by a PBS job scheduler
item.description: At the research institute I currently work at, we use PBS as a job scheduler for collaborative use and research management of the HPC cluster. Just for a little background info, the cluster consists of 14 computers which are connected to make the cluster.
